prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Virginia Society of the Sons of the American Revolution, Accession #10588-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Virginia Society of the Sons of the American Revolution through Thomas Mason, 1987 March 3.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 12 items, 1980-1986, concerning the Virginia Society of the Sons of the American Revolution. Included are committee reports, minutes, copies of The Virginia Bulletin,and material from a notebook kept by the Recording Secretary.

1980-1984
